name: com.getfilta.artist-unityplug
author: Filta
description: A suite of tools to help artists create face filters in Unity. Check www.getfilta.com for more information.

release.releaseNotes:
- feat: change object name from FaceMasks to FaceBlendshapes.
- fix: issue of face texture not working when Variables component is on Filta object
- feat: add onFaceAdd, onFaceRemove and onFaceUpdate nodes.
- fix: rename OnEyeOpenValueChange nodes to OnEyeCloseValueChange
